name: NetHomePlusDehumidifierSmart
0:
”Alexa, Turn on living room”
”alexa, turn off the living room”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using this skill, you can control NetHome Plus dehumidifier: turn on/off, change modes.
After the user wakes up the speaker by “Alexa, turn on dehumidifier.” to call this skill, you can easily control the dehumidifier. 
Uses must do Account Linking following the steps below:
1. Click the ENABLE button, then enter the registered NetHome Plus account.
2. If you do not have a NetHome Plus account, please download NetHome Plus App from Apple AppStore or Google Play
3. After installation and registration, complete the air conditioner activation configuration.
4. Back to the Account Linking interface of Alexa APP, enter the registered NetHome Plus account to complete Account Linking.
